name: LOUDER!
description:
PSX HORROR GAME ABOUT LOADER BASED ON RANDOM
That job so easy - just drag and drop boxes in point A to point B!

Flash the [INFORMATION DELETED} with your photocamera,  and do your work.

The game implies different modes, but now only 2 are implemented.

Unluck - is a way to victory.

https://discord.gg/XHNKg2q
